name: sqlite
description: SQLite MCP Server Desktop Extension using uvx mcp-server-sqlite

scripts.package: npx @anthropic-ai/dxt pack && (mkdir -p ../dist 2>/dev/null || mkdir ..\dist 2>nul || echo) && (mv *.dxt ../dist/sqlite.dxt 2>/dev/null || move *.dxt ..\dist\sqlite.dxt 2>nul || echo 'Please manually move the .dxt file')
scripts.package-ps: npx @anthropic-ai/dxt pack && powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path '../dist')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path '../dist' -Force }; Get-ChildItem -Name '*.dxt' | ForEach-Object { Move-Item $_ '../dist/sqlite.dxt' }"
